page.title: 13INDUSTRIES IN DOVER
page.content: DOVER ENGINEERING WORKS COVERS 6.25 ACRES OF LAND AND PRODUCES;MAN HOLE COVERS,AIRPORT TRENCH COVERS AND DRAIN GRATINGS.250 MEN ARE EMPLOYED HERE,WORKING A 39 HOUR WEEK. THE LONDON FANCY BOX CO.WAS BUILT IN DOVER AFTER WW2 AND IS A CONTRACTOR FOR 5 MAIN FIRMS;MARKS & SPENCER,BRITISH HOME STORES,BOOTS,CADBURY'S & DIGITAL COMPUTERS.SOME GOODS ARE EXPORTED TO SWEDEN AND EIRE.IT EMPLOYS 200-250 PEOPLE AND PRODUCES 6-7000 BOXES PER WEEK. COOMBE VALLEY INDUSTRIAL ESTATE COMPRISES MANY DIVERSE INDUSTRIES WHICH INCLUDE A SCAFFOLDING FIRM,A RECOVERY SERVICE,WHOLESALE SWEET RETAILERS,CAR IMPORTERS,A ROOFING FIRM AND A DAIRY. BUCKLAND PAPER MILL ALSO FORMS A LARGE PART OF DOVER'S INDUSTRY.(SEE RIVER DOUR)
